import { Avatar } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import '../post.css' import ThumbUpIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ThumbUp'; import ChatBubbleOutlineIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ChatBubbleOutline'; import TelegramIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Telegram'; import MoreVertRoundedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVertRounded'; import DeleteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Delete'; import firebase from 'firebase' import db from "../Firebase/firebase"; export default function Post({profilPicture, image ,userName,timeStamp,message}) { const dlt_btn = ()=>{ db.collection('posts').doc(post.id).delete() } return ( <>

{userName}

{new Date(timeStamp).toUTCString()}

{message}

Like

Comment

Share

) }
